hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Blue Fire Arrows# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Deku Tree Compass#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Morpha#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #3# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Bow#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #6# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Compass Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Hookshot# and #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Basement Near Vines Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.
